ferrocarrilesDeAmericaDelSur.railways

Class RailwaySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ferrocarrilesDeAmericaDelSur.railways.RailwaySystem

  • public class RailwaySystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements railway systems. A railway system consists of the tracks, with a shared pass, two railway companies (Bolivia and Peru), some baskets for communication, and a clock to time limit execution.
    Version:
    December 2019
    Author:
    Hugh Osborne
